website_summaries.verdict: Delivers a reliable 1 horsepower and runs very quiet, though installation may be a challenge for some.
pros: Fairly straightforward for experienced DIYers to install
Offers years of reliable operation, owners report
Keeps pool water circulating and fresh
cons: Reports of seals leaking after installation
Does not handle back pressure well
Pump interior may rust after a few years of use

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement but self install warranty is crappy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement pump at a great price! Installed quickly and is extremely quiet! Have only used for a month so hope the longevity is there. I did call company to confirm that full warranty only if professionally installed. Very dissatisfied that a simple install by a knowledgeable pool owner voids 2 year warranty. I believe I was told 60 days is self-installed. If installed properly and runs immediately then clearly the installation was done properly. Company should stand behind their products without buyer being ripped off by a professional installation which would at least double the cost!
customer_reviews.author: JSB

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Great quiet pump
customer_reviews.text: Recently replaced an old 2hp 15 year old pump. This pentair 1hp is moving as much water as my old 2hp did at what feels like a higher pressure. The pump itself is incredibly quiet , so much so I need to walk over to make sure it's on. The install itself was relatively quick (even though ive never done one before). Electrical is super straight forward plug and play pretty much. I like the fact this pump came with the pipe adapters for 1 1/2 , which made install easier. I will update the review in a year to see where it's at. Fingers crossed it lasts as long as my original.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install and Strong, Quiet Performance
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and strong, quiet performance. Plumbing was a little more involved than I hoped, since the existing piping of my old unit didn't match the new configuration, but 2 runs to Home Depot solved that. I had trouble getting it to prime at first, but after a prayer, plus adding plumber's tape to and only hand-tightening the inlet and outlet screw-on adapters, dumping several gallons of water into the leaf basket, opening the bleeder valve, and turning my diverter valve half-way between skimmer & suction, it primed successfully. It runs strong and quiet, and will be a great replacement in lieu of a $1,200 price tag from the local Home Depot or Leslie's Pool Supply store!
customer_reviews.author: E.A. Maznio

customer_reviews.title: Great pump. High quality. Make sure you have an installer before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Has been going strong for a year and a half now. I have a 10K gallon inground pool and run this year-round (8-12 hours a day depending on the season) I had a local solo pool guy contractor install it and saved big bucks instead of paying the mega-store "installation" price...They MAKE you buy the same pump and charge you 2 or 3 times this cost for pump and installation!!!! These specialty pool supply mega-stores WILL NOT install a pump that you purchase on your own and give you the lame excuse that they cannot back the warranty. BS. Find a pool guy who specializes in installing pool equipment then buy this and save yourself money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Powerful.  Change to 115 or else!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a bad review, thinking the capacitor was underpowered or the impeller was jammed. Turns out I never moved the dial from 220 to 115. It is a big black dial near the wiring. This is my second 1hp superpump, and the second time I have redone the wiring and tried to change out the capacitor since I didn't twist the dial. Mind you, most people use 220 and if it came 115 and someone hooked it up to 220, that would fry the motor. For me, wiring 115 but having it set to 220, the motor makes a gentle hum but won't turn on. Switched to 115 and now it is powerful and quiet, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: lococarlosblizz

customer_reviews.title: easy install, quiet, but the lid is a pain to take on and off
customer_reviews.text: It installed and worked as expected. It is a very short pump so I had to use firebricks to shim it up. it is very quiet and works very well. The lid to empty the leaf catcher is a but of a pain. It has ears to turn but.. not easy. there is also a gasket on the top that is supposed to seal it good and I have had to reseat the lid a few times out of 50 because the seal wasn't good. I think I am getting the hang of it though.. Wiggle, turn. In store these were almost $600 I had to order this one cause it is the same thing but much more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: quiet as a mouse-decent price- will update average electric consumption and noise levels in 6 mos.
customer_reviews.text: cons: the base was not high enough to match my existing plumbing ( about 4 inches shorter, but this is my fault for not doing my due diligence) I ended up mounting 2 pieces of 2 inch by 12 inch by 15 inch treated wood that has been sitting in my garage for years. like ANY diy, PLUMBING SHOULD BE PREP, PREP AND MORE PREP TO AVOID LEAKS. INSTALL THE GROUND OUTSIDE OF THE PUMP PROPERLY! pros: price, performance ( i actually saw what it did to my water), and speed of delivery by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: oragon

customer_reviews.title: replacement pump
customer_reviews.text: When I first installed it in Nov 2019 pump was super quiet. Six weeks later it started getting noisy. Now five months later it is tripping the circuit breaker. Have been in contact with Pentair. Seems to be a lot of getting put off on replacement. they want to know who installed the pump. Told them I did. I am a mechanic and pretty well know what I'm doing. Still don't know if they will ship me a replacement or not. Not at all satisfied. also 3 days ago replaced the control panel on my Pentair heat pump. Seem to be spending a lot of money on Pentair replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i had a wisperflow pump I bought the high-performance unit ...
customer_reviews.text: i had a wisperflow pump I bought the high-performance unit it works ok it is much louder then the wisperflow and it doesn't seem to move as much water as the wisperflow wf24 i would say to buy the wisperflow unit instead of the high performance unit its not high hi performance if i could i would send it back and get the wisperflow and gladly pay any difference but i have it now so im stuck with it i have to get used to the noise that it makes for that reason its ok
customer_reviews.author: oboy

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet, Easy install
customer_reviews.text: The old pump/motor setup was leaking, and getting louder by the day. This one requires you to really listen hard, to even know it's running. Has much better pressure, and is keeping my 17,000 gallon inground pool spotless so far.
customer_reviews.author: BigBob

customer_reviews.title: Works like a mule and ours like a kitten.
customer_reviews.text: This little pump was a lifesaver when ours went out. It was easy to install with clear, concise instructions. This little workhorse easily moves the 21,000+ gallons in our pool and keeps it crystal clear. Maintenance is simple with easy access to the filter basket and quick self priming. Our filtration system is located outside the bedroom and with this pump I can no longer hear it from inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Michele O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Direct fit!
customer_reviews.text: Was literally plug and play from our old pump everything was an exact fit and replacement install took less than 30 minutes taking out the old installing the new and turning it on spa was back up and running in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: It died a month after the warranty expired, which was exactly a year. I thought I bought an extended warranty at the time of purchase after reading other bad reviews but apparently I didn't. >:o So, I ended up just replacing the motor with an A.O Smith B2853. We'll see how long this one last.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Riffe

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Direct replacement for my old Pentair pump that starting making noise after ten years. The new one seems to have better flow. Since it was the same pump, it was easy to hook up without doing any piping changes. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rex P.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with ease of ordering and quick delivery. Pump was easy to install and works perfectly. Very smooth and quiet operation.Hardly know that it's on. Extremely pleased with product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great pool pump!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good value from Amazon, and even though it gets "shipped" it arrived double boxed, and the factory box had moulded foam packing so it was completely unscathed. The pump and impeller are really powerful and move a lot of water, primes itself easily, even through a 40' long vacuum hose, and it is decently quiet. Our last pump of this model lasted 5 years, that seems fair to me.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpa Tom

customer_reviews.title: Simple Replacement
customer_reviews.text: The pump arrived within 2 days as advertised and was a simple swap out for my old pump. It works good and is so much quieter than my old one. Connecting the electric wires was a little difficult because of how the pumps whole for the wires is right up against where you then attach them and with thick wire it was a little harder than it had to be to get everything connected right. But in the end it all connected and is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: good replacement for an outdated machine
customer_reviews.text: this is a fantastic replacement for an old 55+year machine. The difference in performance is stunning. The old one was an open impeller that has worn out. The pump is fairly quiet and its priming capability as well as ability to push the air out is superb. the only drawback is the hard-to-close filter lid. Even with a silicon grease as you can read in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: LindaVista

customer_reviews.title: Strong, quiet and durable
customer_reviews.text: I use these pumps 80% of the time when installing a replacement unit in my Pool business and along with Pentair's Whisperflo line they are one the best pumps around. A strong and quiet pump with easy installation, easy seal replacement and with very few parts that ever need servicing make this an excellent choice for any in-ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: T. Parkington

customer_reviews.title: Bleeding current into pool water
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pump three months ago, good pressure and easy hook up. Problem is the pump is feeding current through the water into pool! Not safe at all! Had electrician come out and check everything. It’s all good with wiring, but the pool water has current going to it! Would not recommend this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: ONE YEAR WARRANTY STATEMENT IS FALSE
customer_reviews.text: 1 year a and 4 days vibrating violently, Description indicates 1 year warranty-FALSE-FALSE FALSE. If you order, it register it, and install it yourself, you only get 60 days warranty
customer_reviews.author: J. Rein

customer_reviews.title: Unit Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box the unit had clearly been used before. Fittings bag was open and one of the fittings was damaged. There was water in the pump and the electrical connection plate was damaged and bent. I've STILL had no response to a return request. NOT HAPPY at all.
customer_reviews.author: Delta

customer_reviews.title: NOISY
customer_reviews.text: This pump is at least twice as loud as the old Sta-Rite Pump it is replacing. In fact, it is so loud I am considering returning it and buying something else - damn near anything else. It fit okay with the original plumbing but the threads were not exactly the same, so I have some slight leaks. I am going to buy new PVC fittings to solve the leaks and see if that causes it to run quieter (It is drawing a slight amount of air). I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Up until yesterday the pump worked great, and now it failed to start and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this pump three years ago this week. Up until yesterday the pump worked great, and now it failed to start and we have found a small bolt detached inside the pump housing. It held the impeller and it has stripped it. The capacitor is no longer allowing the pump to start. After reattaching the impeller, the pump pressure is half of what it was before, and it needs to be manually spun to start the pump. Very disappointed this only lasted 3 years, as our last one worked for 16 years. Pump needs better warranty or workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: VR in Abq

customer_reviews.title: Very easy installation and pulls well
customer_reviews.text: Very easy installation and pulls well. This pump is a lower profile then my previous Jandy so I had to build a aluminum deck to raise it approx an inch. Inlet and outlet pipes lined up perfect then. Runs quite and as described. Running about 6 weeks now no troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Wags

customer_reviews.title: Best Pump Ever
customer_reviews.text: We have had to replace our pool pump every 6 years or so and almost every one of them has worked well for awhile and then become noisy and some have required repairs then broke down altogether. This 1 hp pump was easy to install, and easy to maintain. It is incredibly quiet compared to other pumps we have owned. We were worried because I ordered 1hp for a 40K gal pool but there is no problem and water is crystal clear. We highly recommend the Pentair SuperFlo Pump. Price was also very good and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: IndyKat

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good price, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This pump replaced an existing Hayward pump that finally gave up on me. Works great and was very easy to install with the included hardware and instructions. It has been running for about 6 months now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For now it's looking good.
customer_reviews.text: The pump arrived on time. The pump portion is a little redesigned so I had to raise it an inch and a half so it would line up with existing piping. Other that that my install went well. I just installed it today May 28/18. Time will tell how it works. For now it's looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement Pump
customer_reviews.text: This pool pump is a perfect replacement for my pump that was in service for fifteen years. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Krupnik

customer_reviews.title: pump
customer_reviews.text: Good pump one of the best, I don!t like the lid on it ,when you take the lid off the o ring falls off it, you have to replace it on the lid, hoping it will stay there until you put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Bearing going out in less than 2 weeks?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pump and at first it worked great. 13 days later and it has a high pitched noise like a bearing going out. Uploaded a video above of the noise
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: What an improvement!
customer_reviews.text: After my old Pentair basket housing cracked from being screwed on too tight, I searched the local pool supply stores here in Palm Beach County for another Pentair. I couldn't believe the difference in price between Amazon and the brick and mortar stores! Almost a 50% savings. With a few pvc parts from Home Depot, because the old didn't completely line up with the new, and I was done. This is the same horsepower as my old one but moves a lot more water and is quieter. It also has a positive lock on the basket housing so it can't be overtightened. I opted for free standard delivery and it arrived in 5 days. Great job Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: sally klinginsmith

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: The pump had a huge dent in it. The pump was wet like it had been used. I think it may have been a used pump. It does work. I really wish I could send it back but I need to circulate the water Nd this pump took a week to come in.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Pegues

customer_reviews.title: Pump good for two years
customer_reviews.text: I think the pump works great, but, after two years of use, it sprung a leak between the canister lid and pump pipe connection. Hoping they will replace the housing as the motor is still functioning...
customer_reviews.author: TomJacks

customer_reviews.title: Six years later, no problems.
customer_reviews.text: Just looked back over my purchases; found out I bought this pump six years ago. Still going strong, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: BocaDavie

customer_reviews.title: Almost a great pump
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. The last one only worked for 18 months and then just quit. We keep our pool open year round but we’re hoping things like this would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Simbo

customer_reviews.title: So far great
customer_reviews.text: It works it is strong and easy to clean, don't waste your money on the cover I bought separate not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mack

customer_reviews.title: Good name pump for home Depot price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect so far. Started right up, primed easily and runs quietly. Has plenty of power compared to the pump it replaced. Hope it lasts! Made in China as expected, but Pentair is a respectable name. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tony in PBG

customer_reviews.title: Simple replacement.
customer_reviews.text: It was a simple out with the old and an in with the new procedure. Everything lined up and it was done in a half hour, 8ncluding wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Roy J. Rich

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to install and works much better than the last ...
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and works much better than the last pump we had. It is fairly quiet as well. The directions do not provide the information to hook it up to power. Instead like so many other things you buy now, they suggest a professional to hook it up. It isn't rocket science folks but do what ever you think you are capable of. I did it myself, saving likely at least a C note.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K. Sherson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pool pump
customer_reviews.text: I had an electrician wire this new Pentair pump and was able to do the PVC plumbing myself. Much easier to empty the leaf basket than the Hayward pump I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Prissy

customer_reviews.title: Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 3/4 hp pump that had lost it life. Great pump, easy install and price was excellent. Did my homework and this was the best price I could find! Shipping was fast too. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Vaisey

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Needed now pool pump and went into a retailer to get one. The model I got from Amazon was a third of the cost as the one in the store, Same model number. My pump was new, not reconditioned etc. I shopped and this price was the best on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Paws Awhile

customer_reviews.title: Pentair Pool Pump
customer_reviews.text: Pump purchased to replace old Pentair pump that was over 8 years old. Pump packaged correctly and delivered timely, as we paid for the quick 2 day delivery. Installation was a snap for my husband. Upon installation, we had no problems and it has been working great since that moment. Should have bought this earlier, as old pump was having problems over the last 2 years. Used American Express points to help pay for pump and paid a price for it that could not be matched in pool stores or online anywhere else. Thanks Amazon for the American Express points system.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L. Houser

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Due to the excellent design the pump is much quieter than my old on and even my filter is more quiet due to the the Pentair pumps efficiency to completely purge any air from the system. I used to have a gurgling noise in the filter. The pump motor runs at a much cooler temperature than my other pump that was only 4 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old (REALLY old - made of bronze!) 1 HP pump that went belly-up this spring. Installed easily (the couplings supplied with the pumped were a big help). Was wired for 220 V but converted easily to 110 V. Very quiet. Has never leaked a drop. Produces better flow than the old pump and self-primes easily. Flawless performance so far. I also like the fact that it is NOT BLACK and is a very nice looking machine.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. David A. Himes

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous value.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Had a Hayward prior to this one, it was much noisier. Old pump was down for 4 months, in just a few hours already clearing up. I’m going to add some photos later.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: power
customer_reviews.text: Love that it runs very quiet. Very disappointed in the overall power of the pump. It does not provide enough throughput to effectively bring water through the skimmer and clean the pool. The previous pump was smaller (3/4 HP) and that gave me enough suction power in the skimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Meara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our 8+ year old pump and sand filter in early May. Our pool stays crystal clear with minimal chemical use. We should have replaced it years ago; it would have paid for itself with all the money we would have saved on chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward replacement for Hayward pump and motor.
customer_reviews.text: This was almost a drop in fit for the old Hayward pump and motor. Toughest part was snaking the wiring thru the electrical elbow.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E

customer_reviews.title: Working quietly, perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I installed it myself. Coming up on a year now with absolutely no issues. I'd give it 5 stars if not for the crappy warranty, as mentioned in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Range Rat

customer_reviews.title: Wears out quickly!
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd unit in 9 years. Works fine for 1 year, start degrading and new noises in 2nd year, replace again in 3rd year. Junk but what can you do.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Cracked pump
customer_reviews.text: The pump itself is loud, but I dealt with it for a year. Now, it has cracked and is sucking air and I will have to replace the entire pump. My advice, stay away from this one!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Hyche

customer_reviews.title: Pentair is garbage
customer_reviews.text: This pump is garbage, do not buy, after 2 months of use the motor is making noise already just like the last one. Buy a Heyward
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Update review
customer_reviews.text: Good pump easy to install arrived on time Update on my review after 12 months exactly pump stop working
customer_reviews.author: J.M

customer_reviews.title: Motor
customer_reviews.text: Great replace pool motor. Very bad warranty, it requires you to have a license installer put it in stupid, any can install it !!
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully the pump works! When we took it out of the box a piece was broken. Thankfully we were able to use the piece of the old pump. It’s hooked up. Now hopefully it’ll work fine. It was delivered by Fed ex so don’t know if they broke it or it was already broken.
customer_reviews.author: angie h.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The pump did not work when installed. It did not seem to produce enough vacuum it pump the water through the system.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Purvines

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: got me through half a season so far so good........it is pretty loud though compared to the pump i replaced it with.....i wont mind the extra noise as long as this things lasts like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.author: M. Marc

customer_reviews.title: Super-quiet.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this pump six stars for noise level, I would. It is the quietest pool pump motor I have ever had installed. It is easy to install and connect the electric. I did a complete rebuild of the piping to the pump and filters (my choice). Easy, easy.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: I installed this myself - had to reconfigure the pipes to fit the new pump - when installed and running - didn't get any leaks so was successful at that. I found it to be significantly more powerful than my old pump even though the "brake" horsepower was about the same. It's pretty quiet - generates a low smooth sound - I have a small outdoor pump house right next to the pool - so you can hear the low hum if the surroundings are quiet - but with a few noisy kids in the pool you couldn't hear it at all. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Energy Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This motor was appropriately priced when compared to prices from pool companies. Motor is very quiet and appears to be very efficient for circulating water in a 10,000 gallon pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxson

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quiet pump. I had a 3/4 hp Whisperflo with 1.65 Service Factor, and this punp at 1 hp is better than the old one. easy electrical and easy plumbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very fast and the unit was more than expected.very easy to lnstall and works very well ,quiet and great pressure.people were very helpful , making sure every thing was right.very happy.
customer_reviews.author: oleman

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Are use this to replace my whisper flow. Much more quieter
customer_reviews.author: Nathan J McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Install was simple, quiet and can't beat the price! Was considering going with a Hayward, as I did some research hear these pumps are better glad I bought this product, unions are a must as I didn't have on my priveous pump! See how long it last!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great pump for the money !
customer_reviews.text: In a nut shell Great pump and very easy to install ! Hope I get 10 years use as we did on the last one running for 6 hours a day !
customer_reviews.author: hammer

customer_reviews.title: Superflo replacement
customer_reviews.text: I replaced another Pentain Superflo that was 12 years old with this model. Easy install and wiring was identical. The unions make installing it much easier. Hope this one lasts as long as the last one.
customer_reviews.author: jayandlori

customer_reviews.title: No more pentair
customer_reviews.text: The pump is making a high pitch whistle. Had it in for over a week. It started right from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Palladino

customer_reviews.title: Penntair Superflo
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter and better pressure than our old pool pump that finally wore out. We had a Penntair Challenger before.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shogrin

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement
customer_reviews.text: Have used this brand before. Replaced the original pump that was installed by the pool company, but at a much cheaper price. The warranty is the same as theirs. The installation was the same...did not have to reconfigure the original design. Will use the same pump if and when this goes out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff 24 fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Pump, faulty capacitor after 23 months
customer_reviews.text: The pump works extremely well, I bought it in September of 2014 and the capacitor failed in August of 2016. I'm not sure if they sourced faulty capacitors during this time, or this is the usual quality of the capacitor. 1 quick trip to the local non big box (HD and L0w3s don't stock the part) hardware store and I was up and running for $25. Time will tell if the motor is hard on capacitors, or I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Alg Florida

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best pump I have owned. Also so quiet. Can’t hear pump. Just all the water moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Saved us a lot of money buying it online & installing it ourselves!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best for your money
customer_reviews.text: My pump went bad, so I thought I would just buy a new motor and install it myself,until I came across this unit. This is a quality piece, and the install was soooo easy. If you can tie your shoes, you can put this thing in and save$$$$. The unit was a great direct replacement, and has plenty of power, while maintaining a whisper quiet noise level.
customer_reviews.author: SUPERSTAR

customer_reviews.title: Great pool pump
customer_reviews.text: Pump has worked awesome all season so far. Much quieter than our previous pump, more consistent pressure as well. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Better value than Pool Store
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to install with 2 inch plumbing. Not as quiet as Whiper flo it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Rashneesh

customer_reviews.title: Clean pool
customer_reviews.text: This is the best we have ever had.. our automatic pool cleaner has never stopped since we installed this. Our pool has never looked better!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: great pump
customer_reviews.text: current one lasted 5 years so i happily ordered another one. great pump with lots of power and being the same as the old one made it a breeze to install.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine & Jim

customer_reviews.title: This pump is so quiet.
customer_reviews.text: It took less than a week to come in, It looks to be of great quality. The only thing is the power seems to be a little less than my old 1 hp pump. I have to compare the gpm which I should have done before I ordered it. It's still going to get the job done just fine and man is that thing quiet. I also like the way they threaded the inside and outside of the inlet and outlet ports. that saved me a trip to the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product especially for the price. Pump is very quiet but doesn't handle back pressure well. If your filter gets too full it will keep water so it doesn't run dry but will stop pumping to/from the pool. Good brand. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Jamie DeRita

customer_reviews.title: broken parts
customer_reviews.text: the base of the pump was broken and l wasnt able to make it work right away but l needed that same day ... not very good shipping
customer_reviews.author: jose E. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good Pump
customer_reviews.text: Good pump, good price even better than the local pool supply stores! The quick release connections make this pump installation a breeze. If I need to service it, just undo the quick release connections. Its not a permanent glued in pump when all said and done. The pump is so much quieter than our last pump. We had cavitation on the last pump and it always gave a bubble flow that made noise. This pump has a more efficient and quieter flow so no cavitation or noise generation via the pump. The sound level is low, but not completely gone. Easily have a conversation near it without saying "What?" to your partner. Best price pump out there!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hendra

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PUMP
customer_reviews.text: So Quiet it is directly under my bedroom window and its an old 1989 single pain window I love this thing. Pumps efficient and quiet. I have the in floor cleaning system in my pool and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: 1nflteam

customer_reviews.title: I am happy!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner. Well packed. A very quite unit. As some other reviews state using the inside 1 1/2 thread on the exit port leaks no matter how much you tighten it. I made a new hose using the enclosed O ring fitting. This fixed the problem. I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable
customer_reviews.text: I have used this motor for 2 seasons and I turned it on a few days ago and it is louder than a train. I am shocked that this only lasted 2 seasons.
customer_reviews.author: tiger

customer_reviews.title: Look like quality control is slipping
customer_reviews.text: I had it professionally installed but it did not work. The installer check it out and found that the seal diffuserl was missing so the unit would not operate. It would cost me $250 to install a new unit so I kept it and order a new ordered seal rush delivery only out 15 bucks plus an additional 60 bucks for the installer. I bought this unit because of all the positive reviews,but I just got stung. Look like quality control is slipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller not responding about faulty light
customer_reviews.text: Light has stopped working a couple months in. The seller is not responding at all, left multiple emails. Super frustrating. Will never buy from this guy again.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and wire
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Easy to install and wire. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Victor M Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you live in Arizona, protect it from full Sun.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: solid pump for the money
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and runs so quietly. Handles my 18000 gal pool easily
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great lower end pump.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works as advertised. Much quieter that than the 10 year old pump it is replacing. This was a rental home otherwise would have used the Pentair variable speed pump.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear pool!
customer_reviews.text: Had a pump for four years and it burned out, bought this, installation was easy, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet. Unfortunately this is my second one in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. Unfortunately this is my second one in two years. Hope this last. Bought repair kit for the other one. Wish me LUCK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Huber

customer_reviews.title: This one was the perfect replacement. So far it works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We bought a house and within a week, the pump went out on our pool. This one was the perfect replacement. So far it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pump
customer_reviews.text: This is and excellent pump. I can tell everything is high quality and well made. I installed it myself and had no problems with the instructions or any of the parts. It's been running for about a month now and it works great! I would definitely recommend this pump.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K.

customer_reviews.title: Why did this pump stop working
customer_reviews.text: The pump did last a year but after a year it is acting up and working very poorly
customer_reviews.author: SuperEd69

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pump. Much better than the Hayward cheap China made. Had to return 2 of them. This one was a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: William's textbooks

customer_reviews.title: Quality pump and great price
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have made in a long time. Great price and arrived as shown in the ad. I actually have to go to my pool to check and see it the pump is running it is so quiet compared to my old pump. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: budman

customer_reviews.title: Great Pump!
customer_reviews.text: I orderd the 1 HP pump to replace my PacFab pump that after 8 years of service finally gave out I was surprised at how easy it was to replace after a couple of modifications to the return line a cut here a paste there and in a couple of hours it was good to go! very quiet and a lot stronger than my older pump, it's only been a couple of days so time will tell but for now I am very pleased with how it is working. shipping was as promised .
customer_reviews.author: JOSE GARCES

product_meta.title: Pentair 340038 SuperFlo High Performance Single Speed Pool Pump, 1 Horsepower, 115/230 Volt, 1 Phase
product_meta.description:
Size:1-Horsepower 115/230-Volt Single-PhasePentair 340038 SuperFlo High Performance Single Speed Pool Pump, 1 Horsepower, 115/230 Volt, 1 Phase

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The SuperFlo Pumps are a product of nearly 50 years of innovative hydraulic engineering. The result is an ability to move more water more efficiently for lower operating cost and super-quiet operation. Plus, by performing with less effort, there's simply less wear and tear – and that means longer life for a higher return on your pump investment.
feature_bullets: The Pentair SuperFlo single-speed, 1-horsepower pump moves more water more efficiently for lower operating cost
Quiet operation due to superior internal flow design that reduces hydraulic noise
Features thick walled body parts, a heavy-duty 56 square flange motor, and highly engineered hydraulics
Oversized strainer basket extends time between cleanings; see-through lid makes inspection fast and easy
This pump has self-priming for quick, easy start-up; 1-year

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars424 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
